description: {"blocks":[{"key":"e17q6","text":"This protocol details the procedure for immunohistochemical 3,3’-Diaminobenzidine (DAB) staining of free-floating fixed brain tissue sections using the avidin/biotin ABC complex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":28},{"style":"sub","offset":41,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"123se","text":"To use the Vector Labs DAB Peroxidase Substrate Kit (SK-4100):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91oh1","text":"In   dH2O:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":7,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fjvm2","text":"2 drops Reagent 1","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"652bb","text":"4 drops Reagent 2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4sm1u","text":"2 drops Reagent 3","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71ge0","text":"[optional] 2 drops of Reagent 4 (Nickel) if a black reaction product is desired","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ofvl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f19bj","text":"Note: Mix well before use. Use immediately. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqg3f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n9jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":360,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb5f8","text":"Rinse in buffer (e.g. PBS) on a shaker at  : 3 x 3-5 minutes.   - .  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":62,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"12fc4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"9F580771C53911EEA5CE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"9F5807C6C53911EEA5CE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmi61","text":"Mount tissue on glass slides (subbed or charged) in 1:8 buffer in dH2O and let air dry. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":68,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3sqor","text":"Rinse slides with dH2O and let air dry (preferably in a hood).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e9b1k","text":"Coverslips clean and dry slides with Cytoseal 60 (Thermo Fisher #830-16). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
